page.title: 13Southampton's River Test 2
page.content: We spent a sunny day at{Lower Test {Valley Nature Reserve}. Here are some of our observations and comments. {**** RIVER TEST **** "I went looking for river creatures and caught a few{flat fish}and{ {ragworms}." "In the river I saw two pieces of china, bricks, glass, tins, paper, a rusty old bike. I also saw ripples." "I caught loads of{shrimps}. They were white and you could see inside." {**** THE SALT MARSH **** "I found a dead{rabbit}. It was white and had{flies}on it. I think a{fox}may have killed it because it was eaten." "We encountered a huge bog with great big grass almost as tall as me. I was lucky - I had my wellies on!" "I came out of the river, my legs covered in mud, like black boots. It's a brilliant place to come and play!"
